thread.title: Marriage is a good thing
thread.title_full: Marriage is a good thing | News24

author: news24.com
title: Marriage is a good thing
text:
People get married for love. Also for a sense of security.
Also for companionship.
You must work on it . Agree to disagree. Obviously you will have the occasional argument. It is healthy. Not to argue on a regular basis. The best part is to kiss and make up.
Communication is another way of ironing out your differences.
Having things in common. Like for instance sport and reading. Do what he or she wants and the same applies .
To reach a middle ground. In other words to compromise.
Divorce is too easy these days. Not like before when you had no option, but to stay married.
Marriage is a good thing.. Gail Shorkend
